description: The Old West Sunset is a deliciously evil&nbsp;tropical cocktail with hints of pineapple, lime, and smoked orange flavor. This drink has just enough sweetness from the&nbsp;bourbon for your taste buds' delight without any unnecessary sugar crash!A dark pink hue surrounds it while light oranges peak through in different places, creating an aesthetically pleasing pattern on top.
name: Old West Sunset
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. Sherry cask finish or tart cherry syrup
Grilled spam, and an orchid for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients (except for the garnishes) to a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients (except for the garnishes) to a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a highball or rocks glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a highball or rocks glass filled with ice.
